docs.lead_paragraph: THE girl who possesses or cultivates the gift of politeness carries in her hand a fairs wand that will smooth, if it does not entirely efface, many of life's rough places.

headline.main: A Message to Women; The Girl Who Is Always Polite Invariably Makes Friends and Holds Them -- Some Things to Observe.

docs.snippet: THE girl who possesses or cultivates the gift of politeness carries in her hand a fairs wand that will smooth, if it does not entirely efface, many of life's rough places.
